ygData.subject: Re: death
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Absolutely.  I ve looted my corpse at the bottom of the ocean just off the coast of Norther Ro.  Had to come up for air a few times. ... Depends on your
ygData.messageBody:
>I have some questions about dying:
>
>1) If you die in water can you still loot your corpse?


Absolutely. I've looted my corpse at the bottom of the ocean just off the
coast of Norther Ro. Had to come up for air a few times.

>2) How long will your corpse stay in the game after
>you die?


Depends on your level. I think if you're level 4 or lower it is a matter
of hours. Levels 5+ it's a matter of days.

>3) Will your corpse remain in the game after you sign
>off, and if so for how long?


See #2. But keep in mind that if you are logged in, the time that your
corpse will remain goes by quicker.

Chavoc - Level 11 Dark Elf Shadowknight of Fennin Ro
